courseName: Development Studies (with reference to South Asia) - MSc
description: Applicants apply for the  MSc Development Studies programmeÂ but can decide to follow the Contemporary India Pathway upon arrival by choosing the combination of modules required for this pathway (see Structure tab).We welcome applications from those who have worked in a broad field of development, but also from students without relevant work experience who can demonstrate a strong interest in, and understanding of, development issues in Contemporary India.
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
